text: læa rea midi sng rx su l khn dı nxkcak dwy kar phud phasʹa chnchati khxng khea pheux ca di chicæng xyang chad cæng kæ phwk khea xallxhˌ ca thrng hı phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh hlng thang læa thrng chinæa thang kæ phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh læa phraxngkh pen phuthrng dechanuphaph phuthrng pricha yan
